summary: MY ESCORT STALLS WHILE DRIVING, TURNING RIGHT, ETC.  I TOOK IT TO THE DEALERSHIP.  THEY PUT MY ESCORT ON THE COMPUTER AND INFORMED ME THE MASS AIR FLOW SENSOR NEEDED REPLACING.  I DID THIS BUT IT DID NOT SOLVE THE PROBLEM!!!!!!!!!  I NEED HELP.     *NLM    **DIMSII IVOQ ENTRY POSTED AFTER 12/12/02 CUT-OVER TO ARTEMIS*734315
